name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run
description:
Includes Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher v1.20, for:

- Improved game compatibility on modern computers.

- Tweaks to change how the game runs.

- The ability to play mods for the game.

For more info on the mod launcher, see http://docs.donutteam.com/books/lucas-simpsons-hit-run-mod-launcher.

game.custom-name: Lucas Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher
game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher/Lucas Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher.exe

extract.dst: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher

task.name: set_regedit
task.description: Setting mod launcher game EXE path registry key
task.path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\

task.name: set_regedit
task.description: Setting mod launcher game directory path registry key
task.path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\

content:
files:
- mod-launcher-archive: https://cdn.donutteam.com/Downloads/Tools/Lucas'%20Simpsons%20Hit%20&%20Run%20Mod%20Launcher%201.20.zip
game:
  custom-name: Lucas Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas' Simpsons
    Hit & Run Mod Launcher/Lucas Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher.exe
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    description: Installing .NET 3.5 Service Pack 1 runtime
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Extracting mod launcher archive
    dst: drive_c/Program Files/Lucas Stuff/Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools/Lucas'
      Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher
    file: mod-launcher-archive
- task:
    description: Setting mod launcher game EXE path registry key
    key: Game EXE Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: $GAMEDIR/Simpsons.exe
- task:
    description: Setting mod launcher game directory path registry key
    key: Game Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Lucas Stuff\Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Tools\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: $GAMEDIR
